comments.body: Are we running the system tests in CI? If so, where are we storing this key?

We don't run it automatically on CI yet, but you can generate a key and run it locally. In the case of GCP, my team has generated the keys and starts it manually. 
More info: https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/AIRFLOW/AIP-4+Support+for+Automation+of+System+Tests+for+external+systems

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +26,30 @@from tests.test_utils.system_tests_class import SystemTest

CREDENTIALS_DIR = os.environ.get('CREDENTIALS_DIR', '/files/airflow-breeze-config/keys')
SNOWFLAKE_KEY = 'snowflake.json'
SNOWFLAKE_CREDENTIALS_PATH = os.path.join(CREDENTIALS_DIR, SNOWFLAKE_KEY)
